markdownRemark.excerpt: Ways to beat feeling of 'undefined' The feeling of being 'undefined' can be very disheartening, as you strive to make sense of the direction of your future. But…
markdownRemark.html:
Ways to beat feeling of 'undefined'

The feeling of being 'undefined' can be very disheartening, as you strive to make sense of the direction of your future. But, with a few simple strategies, this feeling doesn't have to linger forever.

Take the time to identify your passions

The most important step in overcoming the feeling of being 'undefined' is to take the time to figure out what it is you are passionate about. What do you enjoy doing or spending your time on? What have you always wanted to do or try? Taking the time to identify your passions is the first step in uncovering potential paths for your life.

Find a mentor

It can be incredibly helpful to have an objective person in your life to guide and mentor you through the process of life planning. Whether it be a relative, teacher, or even a good friend, having someone you can safely talk through your dreams and fears can help you get unstuck.

##Think outside-the-box

Sometimes we can be limited in our thinking, so it's important to make sure you take the time to explore different possibilities. Brainstorm lists of potential career paths and look into different ways of achieving these paths. Learn more about the industries and activities you're interested in and develop creative solutions that you may not have thought of before.

Know that it's okay to take risks

One of the biggest causes of feeling 'undefined' is the fear of failure. But, it's important to remember that failure is part of the learning process and taking risks is part of living life to the fullest. Embrace the idea of learning through trial and error and remember that, even if you make a mistake, it doesn't have to define you.

Break the process into small chunks

Sometimes it can be overwhelming to tackle your 'undefined' feeling all at once. Instead, break the process into smaller, attainable goals. Set smaller milestones for yourself and don’t forget to reward yourself for each step that you take!

Find motivation from community

Don't be afraid to reach out and find a positive community to be a part of. Seeing others take risks and find their own paths and passions can be a great source of motivation. See if there are seminars, workshops, or even online clubs you can join to surround yourself with like-minded people.

At the end of the day, don't forget that you have the power to make your own choices and define your own life. Don't let the feeling of being undefined stop you from making your dreams into reality.

frontmatter.title: Maximize Your Weight Loss Results with These Life Hacks
frontmatter.description: is an informative article that looks at small changes you can make to your routine in order to reach your weight loss goals more effectively. The article specifically looks at some simple to implement tips such as meal prepping, getting enough sleep, and drinking enough water to better support your health and weight loss.

frontmatter.title: The Surprising Benefits of Implementing Weight Loss Hacks
The Best Weight Loss Hacks for a Busy Schedule
